verses.verse: וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <WH559> said בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the sons הַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <WH5030> of the prophets אֶל־ <WH413> to אֱלִישָׁ֑ע <WH477> Elisha הִנֵּֽה־ <WH2009> Behold נָ֣א <WH4994> now הַמָּק֗וֹם <WH4725> Behold now the place אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after אֲנַ֜חְנוּ <WH587> we יֹשְׁבִ֥ים <WH3427> where we dwell שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> in it לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> unto צַ֥ר <WH6862> with thee is too strait מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> is too

נֵֽלְכָה־ <WH1980> go נָּ֣א <WH4994> Please עַד־ <WH5704> against הַיַּרְדֵּ֗ן <WH3383> we pray thee unto Jordan וְנִקְחָ֤ה <WH3947> and take מִשָּׁם֙ <WH8033> there אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> thence every man קוֹרָ֣ה <WH6982> beam אֶחָ֔ת <WH259> a וְנַעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> and let us make לָּ֥נוּ שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> there מָק֖וֹם <WH4725> us a place לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> there where we may dwell שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> where וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he answered לֵֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> Go

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> And one ה֥וֹאֶל <WH2974> Be content נָ֖א <WH4994> Please וְלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> to go אֶת־ <WH854> with עֲבָדֶ֑יךָ <WH5650> with thy servants וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he answered אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I אֵלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> shall go
וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> went אִתָּ֑ם <WH854> for וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> with them And when they came הַיַּרְדֵּ֔נָה <WH3383> to Jordan וַֽיִּגְזְר֖וּ <WH1504> they cut down הָעֵצִֽים׃ <WH6086> wood

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become הָֽאֶחָד֙ <WH259> But as one מַפִּ֣יל <WH5307> was felling הַקּוֹרָ֔ה <WH6982> a beam וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּרְזֶ֖ל <WH1270> the axe head נָפַ֣ל <WH5307> fell אֶל־ <WH413> into הַמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> into the water וַיִּצְעַ֥ק <WH6817> and he cried וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> and said אֲהָ֥הּ <WH162> Alas אֲדֹנִ֖י <WH113> master וְה֥וּא <WH1931> it was שָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7592> for it was borrowed

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said אִישׁ־ <WH376> And the man הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God אָ֣נָה <WH575> Where נָפָ֑ל <WH5307> fell וַיַּרְאֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7200> it? And he shewed אֶת־ <WH853> הַמָּק֔וֹם <WH4725> him the place וַיִּקְצָב־ <WH7094> And he cut down עֵץ֙ <WH6086> a stick וַיַּשְׁלֶךְ־ <WH7993> and cast שָׁ֔מָּה <WH8033> there וַיָּ֖צֶף <WH6687> did swim הַבַּרְזֶֽל׃ <WH1270> [it] in thither and the iron
וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> Therefore said הָ֣רֶם <WH7311> he Take [it] up לָ֑ךְ וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> to thee And he put out יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> his hand וַיִּקָּחֵֽהוּ׃ <WH3947> and took פ

וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Then the king אֲרָ֔ם <WH758> of Syria הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become נִלְחָ֖ם <WH3898> warred בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> against Israel וַיִּוָּעַץ֙ <WH3289> and took counsel אֶל־ <WH413> his עֲבָדָ֣יו <WH5650> with his servants לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying אֶל־ <WH413> about מְק֛וֹם <WH4725> a place פְּלֹנִ֥י <WH6423> In such אַלְמֹנִ֖י <WH492> and such תַּחֲנֹתִֽי׃ <WH8466> [shall be] my camp

וַיִּשְׁלַ֞ח <WH7971> sent אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> And the man הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying הִשָּׁ֕מֶר <WH8104> Beware מֵעֲבֹ֖ר <WH5674> that thou pass הַמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> a place הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> not such כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there אֲרָ֥ם <WH758> for thither the Syrians נְחִתִּֽים׃ <WH5181> be broken

וַיִּשְׁלַ֞ח <WH7971> sent מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶֽל־ <WH413> to הַמָּק֞וֹם <WH4725> to the place אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which אָֽמַר־ <WH559> told ל֧וֹ אִישׁ־ <WH376> which the man הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> of God [וְהִזְהִירָהּ כ] (וְהִזְהִירֹ֖ו <WH2094> admonish ק) וְנִשְׁמַ֣ר <WH8104> him of and saved שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> there לֹ֥א <WH3808> not אַחַ֖ת <WH259> himself there not once וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or שְׁתָּֽיִם׃ <WH8147> nor twice

וַיִּסָּעֵר֙ <WH5590> was sore troubled לֵ֣ב <WH3820> Therefore the heart מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king אֲרָ֔ם <WH758> of Syria עַל־ <WH5921> over הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> for this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> and he called אֶל־ <WH413> about עֲבָדָיו֙ <WH5650> his servants וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> about הֲלוֹא֙ <WH3808> not תַּגִּ֣ידוּ <WH5046> unto them Will ye not shew לִ֔י מִ֥י <WH4310> which מִשֶּׁלָּ֖נוּ <WH7945> cause אֶל־ <WH413> of מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> me which of us [is] for the king יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said אַחַ֣ד <WH259> And one מֵֽעֲבָדָ֔יו <WH5650> of his servants ל֖וֹא <WH3808> No אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> None my lord הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> O king כִּֽי־ <WH3588> but אֱלִישָׁ֤ע <WH477> but Elisha הַנָּבִיא֙ <WH5030> the prophet אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> that [is] in Israel יַגִּיד֙ <WH5046> telleth לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> הַ֨דְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who תְּדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> that thou speakest בַּחֲדַ֥ר <WH2315> chamber מִשְׁכָּבֶֽךָ׃ <WH4904> bed

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said לְכ֤וּ <WH1980> Go וּרְאוּ֙ <WH7200> and spy אֵיכֹ֣ה <WH351> where ה֔וּא <WH1931> I וְאֶשְׁלַ֖ח <WH7971> he [is] that I may send וְאֶקָּחֵ֑הוּ <WH3947> and fetch וַיֻּגַּד־ <WH5046> him And it was told ל֥וֹ לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> him saying הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold בְדֹתָֽן׃ <WH1886> Behold [he is] in Dothan

וַיִּשְׁלַח־ <WH7971> Therefore sent שָׁ֛מָּה <WH8033> there סוּסִ֥ים <WH5483> he thither horses וְרֶ֖כֶב <WH7393> and chariots וְחַ֣יִל <WH2428> host כָּבֵ֑ד <WH3515> and a great וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> and they came לַ֔יְלָה <WH3915> by night וַיַּקִּ֖פוּ <WH5362> about עַל־ <WH5921> and הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> the city

וַ֠יַּשְׁכֵּם <WH7925> early מְשָׁרֵ֨ת <WH8334> And when the servant אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> of the man הָֽאֱלֹהִים֮ <WH430> of God לָקוּם֒ <WH6965> was risen וַיֵּצֵ֕א <WH3318> and gone forth וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> behold חַ֛יִל <WH2428> behold an host סוֹבֵ֥ב <WH5437> compassed אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> the city וְס֣וּס <WH5483> both with horses וָרָ֑כֶב <WH7393> and chariots וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said נַעֲר֥וֹ <WH5288> And his servant אֵלָ֛יו <WH413> to him אֲהָ֥הּ <WH162> unto him Alas אֲדֹנִ֖י <WH113> my master אֵיכָ֥ה <WH349> shall we נַֽעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> how shall we do

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he answered אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֑א <WH3372> Fear כִּ֤י <WH3588> for רַבִּים֙ <WH7227> not for they that [be] with us [are] more אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אִתָּ֔נוּ <WH854> for מֵאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who אוֹתָֽם׃ <WH854> for

וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֤ל <WH6419> prayed אֱלִישָׁע֙ <WH477> And Elisha וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <WH559> and said יְהוָ֕ה <WH3068> LORD פְּקַח־ <WH6491> I pray thee open נָ֥א <WH4994> pray אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינָ֖יו <WH5869> his eyes וְיִרְאֶ֑ה <WH7200> that he may see וַיִּפְקַ֤ח <WH6491> opened יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> the eyes הַנַּ֔עַר <WH5288> of the young man וַיַּ֗רְא <WH7200> and he saw וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> and behold הָהָ֜ר <WH2022> and behold the mountain מָלֵ֨א <WH4390> [was] full סוּסִ֥ים <WH5483> of horses וְרֶ֛כֶב <WH7393> and chariots אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> of fire סְבִיבֹ֥ת <WH5439> round about אֱלִישָֽׁע׃ <WH477> Elisha

וַיֵּרְדוּ֮ <WH3381> And when they came down אֵלָיו֒ <WH413> about וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֨ל <WH6419> prayed אֱלִישָׁ֤ע <WH477> to him Elisha אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <WH559> and said הַךְ־ <WH5221> Smite נָ֥א <WH4994> pray אֶת־ <WH853> הַגּוֹי־ <WH1471> this people הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this בַּסַּנְוֵרִ֑ים <WH5575> I pray thee with blindness וַיַּכֵּ֥ם <WH5221> And he smote בַּסַּנְוֵרִ֖ים <WH5575> them with blindness כִּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> according to the word אֱלִישָֽׁע׃ <WH477> of Elisha

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֲלֵהֶ֜ם <WH413> then אֱלִישָׁ֗ע <WH477> And Elisha לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor זֶ֣ה <WH2088> This הַדֶּרֶךְ֮ <WH1870> unto them This [is] not the way וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor זֹ֣ה <WH2090> neither [is] this הָעִיר֒ <WH5892> the city לְכ֣וּ <WH1980> will bring אַחֲרַ֔י <WH310> And וְאוֹלִ֣יכָה <WH1980> brought אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> you to the man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom תְּבַקֵּשׁ֑וּן <WH1245> whom ye seek וַיֹּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> will bring אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> שֹׁמְרֽוֹנָה׃ <WH8111> them to Samaria

וַיְהִי֮ <WH1961> become כְּבֹאָ֣ם <WH935> And it came to pass when they were come שֹׁמְרוֹן֒ <WH8111> into Samaria וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלִישָׁ֔ע <WH477> that Elisha יְהוָ֕ה <WH3068> LORD פְּקַ֥ח <WH6491> open אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינֵֽי־ <WH5869> the eyes אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> of these וְיִרְא֑וּ <WH7200> of these [men] that they may see וַיִּפְקַ֤ח <WH6491> opened יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> עֵ֣ינֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5869> their eyes וַיִּרְא֕וּ <WH7200> and they saw וְהִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> and behold בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> and behold [they were] in the midst שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <WH8111> of Samaria

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to אֱלִישָׁ֔ע <WH477> unto Elisha כִּרְאֹת֖וֹ <WH7200> when he saw אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> הַאַכֶּ֥ה <WH5221> shall I smite אַכֶּ֖ה <WH5221> [them]? shall I smite אָבִֽי׃ <WH1> them My father

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he answered לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תַכֶּ֔ה <WH5221> Thou shalt not smite הַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> those שָׁבִ֛יתָ <WH7617> those whom thou hast taken captive בְּחַרְבְּךָ֥ <WH2719> with thy sword וּֽבְקַשְׁתְּךָ֖ <WH7198> arch אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you מַכֶּ֑ה <WH5221> [them] wouldest thou smite שִׂים֩ <WH7760> appoint לֶ֨חֶם <WH3899> bread וָמַ֜יִם <WH4325> and water לִפְנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH6440> before וְיֹֽאכְלוּ֙ <WH398> them that they may eat וְיִשְׁתּ֔וּ <WH8354> and drink וְיֵלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> and go אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲדֹנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH113> to their master

וַיִּכְרֶ֨ה <WH3739> And he prepared לָהֶ֜ם <WH1992> like כֵּרָ֣ה <WH3740> provision גְדוֹלָ֗ה <WH1419> great וַיֹּֽאכְלוּ֙ <WH398> for them and when they had eaten וַיִּשְׁתּ֔וּ <WH8354> and drunk וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֵ֔ם <WH7971> he sent them away וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> went אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲדֹֽנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH113> to their master וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יָ֤סְפוּ <WH3254> no more עוֹד֙ <WH5750> again גְּדוּדֵ֣י <WH1416> So the bands אֲרָ֔ם <WH758> of Syria לָב֖וֹא <WH935> came בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> into the land יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel פ

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came אַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> And it came to pass after this כֵ֔ן <WH3651> this וַיִּקְבֹּ֛ץ <WH6908> gathered בֶּן־ הֲדַ֥ד <WH1130> that Benhadad מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king אֲרָ֖ם <WH758> of Syria אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַחֲנֵ֑הוּ <WH4264> all his host וַיַּ֕עַל <WH5927> and went up וַיָּ֖צַר <WH6696> and besieged עַל־ <WH5921> and שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <WH8111> Samaria

וַיְהִ֨י <WH1961> was sold רָעָ֤ב <WH7458> famine גָּדוֹל֙ <WH1419> And there was a great בְּשֹׁ֣מְר֔וֹן <WH8111> in Samaria וְהִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> and behold צָרִ֣ים <WH6696> and behold they besieged עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> and עַ֣ד <WH5704> until הֱי֤וֹת <WH1961> was sold רֹאשׁ־ <WH7218> head חֲמוֹר֙ <WH2543> it until an ass's בִּשְׁמֹנִ֣ים <WH8084> was [sold] for fourscore כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> [pieces] of silver וְרֹ֛בַע <WH7255> and the fourth part הַקַּ֥ב <WH6894> of a cab [חֲרֵייֹונִים כ] (דִּבְיֹונִ֖ים <WH2755> doves' dung ק) בַּחֲמִשָּׁה־ <WH2568> for five כָֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> [pieces] of silver
